info.report-description: LTE UE State measurement (M8013) measures UE State Management related measurements

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_COMP (M8013C5)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful RRC Connection Setups. UPDATED: The reception of an RRC Connection Setup Complete message sent by the UE to eNB.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_EST_F_RRCCOMPL_MISSING (M8013C6)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment failures due to a missing RRC CONNECTION SETUP COMPLETE message. The UE has not reached the ECM-CONNECTED state. UPDATED: Timer expiration

kpi_info.title: SIGN_EST_F_RRCCOMPL_ERROR (M8013C7)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment failures due to the Erroneous or incomplete RRC CONNECTION SETUP COMPLETE message. The UE has not reached the ECM-CONNECTED state. UPDATED: The reception of an erroneous or incomplete RRC Connection Setup Complete message.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_FAIL_RRMRAC (M8013C8)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment failures due to Rejection by RRM RAC. The UE has not reached the ECM-CONNECTED state. UPDATED: An internal message from the RRM

kpi_info.title: EPC_INIT_TO_IDLE_UE_NORM_REL (M8013C9)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated transitions to the ECM-IDLE state due to a Normal release by the UE . UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_INIT_TO_IDLE_DETACH (M8013C10)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated transitions to the ECM-IDLE state due to the Detach procedure by the UE or the MME . UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_INIT_TO_IDLE_RNL (M8013C11)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE state due to Radio Network Layer cause. The UE-associated logical S1-connection is released. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to the eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_INIT_TO_IDLE_OTHER (M8013C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated transitions to the ECM-IDLE state due to Other causes. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: ENB_INIT_TO_IDLE_NORM_REL (M8013C13)
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated transitions from the ECM-CONNECTED to ECM-IDLE state due to "User Inactivity" or "Redirect". The UE-associated logical S1-connection is released. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME with the following release causes: - RNL User Inactivity - RNL E-UTRAN Generated Reason in case of Redirect to LTE - RNL Inter-RAT Redirection.

kpi_info.title: ENB_INIT_TO_IDLE_RNL (M8013C15)
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB initiated transitions from the ECM-CONNECTED to ECM-IDLE state when the Radio Connection to the UE is lost. The UE-associated logical S1-connection is released. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to the MME with release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE Lost".

kpi_info.title: ENB_INIT_TO_IDLE_OTHER (M8013C16)
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated transitions from the ECM-CONNECTED to ECM-IDLE state due to Other causes than "User Inactivity", "Redirect" or "Radio Connection Lost". UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME. The counter is updated if the use case does not match "User Inactivity", "Redirect" and "Lost Radio Connection".

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_MO_S (M8013C17)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for mobile originated signaling. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED has started. UPDATED: This counter is updated following the reception of an RRC Connection Request message sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_MT (M8013C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for mobile terminated connections. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRC Connection Request message sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_MO_D (M8013C19)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for mobile originated data connections. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRC Connection Request message sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_OTHERS (M8013C20)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts due to other reasons. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRC Connection Request message sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_EMG (M8013C21)
kpi_info.use: Number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for emergency calls. UPDATED: Reception of the RRC: RRCConnectionRequest message (eNB <- UE) in case that this message contains the EstablishmentCause set to emergency (3GPP TS 36.331). Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SUBFRAME_DRX_ACTIVE_UE (M8013C24)
kpi_info.use: The number of subframes, when UE is DRX Active. UPDATED: This counter is updated at each subframe when UE is DRX Active.

kpi_info.title: SUBFRAME_DRX_SLEEP_UE (M8013C25)
kpi_info.use: The number of subframes, when UE is DRX Sleep (that is not DRX Active). UPDATED: This counter is updated at each subframe when UE is DRX Sleep (i.e. not DRX Active).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_COMP_EMG (M8013C26)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for emergency calls UPDATED: Reception of the RRC: RRCConnectionSetupComplete message (eNB <- UE) in case that this message was received from the UE after the reception of the RRC: RRCConnectionRequest message (eNB <-UE) with EstablishmentCause set to emergency (3GPP TS 36.331)

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_FAIL_RB_EMG (M8013C27)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment failures for emergency calls due to missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources UPDATED: Transmission of the RRC: RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) because of missing RB (Radio Bearer) resources in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRC: RRCConnectionRequest message (eNB <- UE) with EstablishmentCause set to emergency (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: PRE_EMPT_UE_CONTEXT_NON_GBR (M8013C28)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE contexts being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) with RNL cause "Radio resources not available".

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_NEMG (M8013C29)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected RRC Connection Establishment Requests for any establishment cause except for "emergency" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload or any other reason. UPDATED: Transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRC:RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to any other cause than "emergency" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_EMG (M8013C30)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected RRC Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "emergency" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload or any other reason. UPDATED: Transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRC:RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "emergency" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_HIPRIO (M8013C31)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for highPriorityAccess connections. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRCConnectionRequest message with highPriorityAccess EstablishmentCause sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_HIPRIO (M8013C32)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for highPriorityAccess calls. UPDATED: The reception of the RRCConnectionSetupComplete message (UE -> eNB) in case that this message was received from the UE after the reception of the RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to highPriorityAccess (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_HIPRIO (M8013C33)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "highPriorityAccess" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "highPriorityAccess" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_DEL_TOL (M8013C34)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment attempts for delayTolerantAccess connections. From UE's point of view, the transition from ECM-IDLE to ECM-CONNECTED is started. UPDATED: The reception of an RRCConnectionRequest message with delayTolerantAccess EstablishmentCause sent by the UE to eNB. Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_MO_S (M8013C35)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for mobile originating signaling. UPDATED: The reception of the RRCConnectionSetupComplete message, which was received as a consequence of a preceeding reception of the RRCConnectionRequest message with EstablishmentCause set to mo-Signalling (3GPP TS 36.331). Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_MO_D (M8013C36)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for mobile originating calls. UPDATED: The reception of the RRCConnectionSetupComplete message, which was received as a consequence of a preceeding reception of the RRCConnectionRequest message with EstablishmentCause set to mo-Data (3GPP TS 36.331). Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_MT (M8013C37)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for mobile terminating access. UPDATED: The reception of the RRCConnectionSetupComplete message, which was received as a consequence of a preceeding reception of the RRCConnectionRequest message with EstablishmentCause set to mt-Access (3GPP TS 36.331). Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_DEL_TOL (M8013C38)
kpi_info.use: The number of Signaling Connection Establishment completions for delay tolerant access. UPDATED: The reception of the RRCConnectionComplete message, which was received as a consequence of a preceeding reception of the RRCConnectionRequest message with EstablishmentCause set to delayTolerantAccess (3GPP TS 36.331). Note: If a UE (erroneously) sends this message several times in a row without waiting the proper time for the response from eNB (RRCConnectionSetup), only the last message will be counted.

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_MO_S (M8013C39)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "mo-Signalling" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "mo-Signalling" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_MO_D (M8013C40)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "mo-Data" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload, or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "mo-Data" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_MT (M8013C41)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "mt-Access" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload, or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "mt-Access" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_REJ_DEL_TOL (M8013C42)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "delayTolerantAccess" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload, or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "delayTolerantAccess" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi_info.title: S1_SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_ATT_UE (M8013C43)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE-specific logical S1 Signaling Connection Establishment attempts being used for subsequent UE-specific S1 signaling. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL UE message (eNB->MME) that contains the first NAS signaling message to the MME (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: S1_SIGN_CONN_ESTAB_SUCC_UE (M8013C44)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE-specific logical S1 Signaling Connection Establishment completions being used for subsequent UE-specific S1 signaling. UPDATED: Reception of the first S1AP message (MME->eNB) containing NAS signaling, which was received as a consequence of a preceding transmission of the S1AP:INITIAL UE message (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_SETUP_ATT (M8013C45)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE Context Setup attempts. It includes also the UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated irrespective of the UE Context being subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_SETUP_ATT_CSFB (M8013C46)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of UE Context Setup attempts. Only the UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated only in case that this message contains the CS Fallback Indicator IE - that is, the UE is subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_SETUP_SUCC (M8013C47)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established UE Contexts. It includes also the UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated irrespective of the UE Context being subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_SETUP_SUCC_CSFB (M8013C48)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established UE Contexts. Only those UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback are counted. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated only in case that the preceding received S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message has contained the CS Fallback Indicator IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_SETUP_FAIL_RADIO_INT (M8013C49)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of failed UE Context Setups caused by a failed radio interface procedure, which is, for example the timeout of the UE Capability Enquiry or of the RRC Connection Reconfiguration procedure and also in case that the start of the AS security at the UE has not been successful. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP FAILURE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated in case that the failure cause is equal to "RNL:Failure in the Radio Interface Procedure" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_MOD_ATT (M8013C50)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted UE Context Modifications. It includes also the UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated irrespective of the UE Context being subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_MOD_ATT_CSFB (M8013C51)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted UE Context Modifications. Only those UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated only in case that this message contains the CS Fallback Indicator IE - that is, the UE is subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_MOD_SUCC (M8013C52)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful UE Context Modifications. It includes also the UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated irrespective of the UE Context being subject to CS Fallback (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_MOD_SUCC_CSFB (M8013C53)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful UE Context Modifications. Only those UE Contexts that are subject to CS Fallback are counted. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated only in case that the preceding received S1AP:UE CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST mesage has contained the CS Fallback Indicator IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB (M8013C54)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts intiated by the eNB irrespective of the release cause. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME. The counter is updated for all radio network layer causes used by the eNB initiated UE CONTEXT RELEASE like "Unspecified", "User inactivity", "Radio Connection With UE Lost", "Failure in the Radio Interface Procedure", "TX2RELOCOverall Expiry", "TS1RELOCoverall Expiry", "Release due to E-UTRAN Generated Reason", "Inter-RAT redirection", "Radio resources not available", "Invalid QoS combination", "CS Fallback Triggered", "Redirection towards 1xRTT", and "UE Not Available For PS Service" (3GPP TS 36.413). The counter is updated for all transport network layer causes used by the eNB initiated UE CONTEXT RELEASE like "Transport Resource Unavailable" and "Unspecified" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_USER_INA (M8013C55)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts intiated by the eNB due to User Inactivity (normal release). UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL User Inactivity" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_CONN_LOSS (M8013C56)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB in case that the radio connection between the eNB and the UE is lost. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection With UE Lost". The trigger "expiration of THOOverall " must be excluded because in case of a failed intra eNB HO, the counter UE_CTX_REL_ENB_TIMER_HO is updated (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_RADIO_INT (M8013C57)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB due to a failure in the radio interface procedure. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the cause "RNL Failure in the Radio Interface Procedure" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_EUTRAN_REAS (M8013C58)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB due to E-UTRAN generated reasons. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the cause "RNL Release due to E-UTRAN generated reason" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_NO_RADIO_RES (M8013C59)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB due to missing radio resources. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the cause "RNL Radio resources not available" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_RNL_UNSPEC (M8013C60)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB with the release cause "RNL Unpecified". It is used e.g. in case of AS Security problems or in case of abnormal handover conditions. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME with the cause "RNL Unspecified" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: UE_CTX_REL_ENB_TIMER_HO (M8013C61)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of released UE contexts initiated by the eNB due to a failed handover execution/completion phase. UPDATED: The counter is incremented by one upon the transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message sent by the eNB to the MME due to a failed handover. In case of an X2 handover, the release cause "RNL TX2RELOCoverall Expiry" is used. In case of an S1 handover, the release cause "RNL TS1RELOCoverall Expiry" is used. In case of an intra eNB handover, the release cause "RNL Radio Connection With UE Lost" is used (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
